Wind
In southeast, northerly or northeasterly 5 or 6, decreasing 3 to 5. In northwest, variable 2 to 4, becoming southerly 4 to 6 in west.

Weather
In southeast, showers, thundery at first. In northwest, mainly fair.

In southeast, good occasionally poor. In northwest, good.
